availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Melinda A. McKinney. Father of Martha McKinney and Oden McKinney. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 302.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 5, p. 141A.
Find A Grave, "William McKinney (1839-1931)," Memorial #16006711 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/16006711 (accessed January 13, 2020).
